item.title: 石油价格企稳，国债收益率从月度低点反弹
item.description: 由于油价反弹，国债收益率从上个月的最低水平走高，投资者为周三出售 700 亿美元的五年期国债做好了准备。【原文：Treasury yields edged higher from the lowest levels of the past month as oil prices rebounded, and investors braced for a $70 billion sale of five-year notes Wednesday.】

item.title: 意甲考虑出售海外媒体版权股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，意大利顶级足球联赛正在探索出售其国际媒体版权业务的股份。【原文：Italy’s top football league is exploring selling a stake in its international media rights business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥总统辛鲍姆称太空探索技术公司污染了边境地区
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）说，SpaceX 在得克萨斯州发射的 "星际飞船 "火箭碎片污染了边境地区。【原文：SpaceX’s Starship rocket launches in Texas have polluted an area across the border with debris, Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said.】

item.title: 火星公司价值 360 亿美元的 Kellanova 交易遭到欧盟全面调查
item.description: 玛氏公司以 360 亿美元竞购品客薯片生产商凯兰诺华公司的交易面临着潜在的障碍，因为欧盟对这一近十年来最大的包装食品交易可能阻碍竞争的担忧展开了深入调查。【原文：Mars Inc.’s $36 billion bid for Pringles chips maker Kellanova faces a potential glitch after European Union opened an in-depth investigation over concerns the largest packaged-food deal in almost a decade could thwart competition.】

item.title: Paradigm 将以超过 10 亿美元的价值投资预测市场 Kalshi
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，与 Polymarket 竞争的预测市场 Kalshi Inc.上述人士表示，专注于加密货币投资的风险投资公司Paradigm正在主导这笔交易。【原文：Kalshi Inc., a prediction market that competes with Polymarket, is raising more than $100 million at a valuation that exceeds $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter. Paradigm, a venture capital firm focused on cryptocurrency investments, is leading the deal, the people said.】

item.title: 美国经济例外论已死的一个标志
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 前黑石和 Tether 二人计划推动 10 亿美元的加密储备计划
item.description: 黑石集团前交易员和稳定币巨头 Tether Holdings SA 的联合创始人正联手为一家上市加密货币公司融资 10 亿美元，该公司旨在囤积数字资产组合。【原文：A former Blackstone Inc. dealmaker and a co-founder of stablecoin giant Tether Holdings SA are teaming up to raise $1 billion for a listed crypto vehicle that aims to hoard a portfolio of digital assets.】

item.title: Stuxnet与美国空袭伊朗的重大区别
item.description: 6 月 17 日发布的卫星图像中的伊朗纳坦兹核燃料生产基地。来源：Planet Labs PBC行星实验室 PBC【原文：Iran’s Natanz nuclear-fuel production site, in a satellite imag released on June 17. Source: Planet Labs PBC】

item.title: 石油交易商在英国与前妻离婚纠纷中被判缓刑
item.description: 一名俄罗斯石油交易商在伦敦被判缓刑，原因是他在一场激烈的离婚官司中没有遵守法庭命令。【原文：A Russian oil trader was handed a suspended prison sentence in London, after failing to follow court orders made during a bitter divorce battle.】

item.title: 英国医疗公司遭网络攻击导致患者死亡
item.description: 卫生官员首次证实，去年在伦敦医院造成混乱的网络攻击导致一名病人死亡。【原文：A cyberattack that caused disruption at hospitals in London last year contributed to the death of a patient, health officials have confirmed for the first time.】

item.title: 市政债券市场接近 5 万亿美元，一季度创历史新高
item.description: 由于州政府和地方政府急于以创纪录的速度借款为项目提供资金，市政债券银行家们今年格外忙碌。【原文：Municipal-bond bankers have been extra busy this year as state and local governments rush to borrow at a record pace to fund projects.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称美联储停止向银行支付利息不会省钱
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，取消向在央行存入现金的银行支付利息的提议不会节省资金，而重新回到稀缺储备制度将是一项挑战，并会带来波动风险。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said a proposal to eliminate the interest paid to banks that deposit cash at the central bank would not save money, and moving back to a scarce reserves regime would be challenging and risk volatility.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯支持 "积极耐心 "的利率政策
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，在评估关税对经济的影响时，采取 "积极耐心 "的货币政策是合适的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said an “actively patient” approach to monetary policy is appropriate while assessing the impact of tariffs on the economy.】

item.title: 高盛称中东战争重启美元与股市的反向联系
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：This month’s geopolitical tension focused on the Middle East is re-establishing the dollar’s traditional inverse relationship with risk assets, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称关税引发的通胀仍是个大问题
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周三表示，美国央行仍在努力确定关税对消费者价格的影响。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Wednesday said the US central bank is still struggling to determine the impact of tariffs on consumer prices.】

item.title: 华尔街为机器人、不明飞行物和量子赌注投资科幻 ETF
item.description: 在 ETF 世界的投机角落，人工智能正迅速成为昨日黄花。相反，人类命运的下一个颠覆性赌注正在进入科幻小说的领域：人形机器人、UFO 和量子计算。【原文：In a speculative corner of the ETF world, artificial intelligence is fast becoming yesterday’s trade. Instead, the next disruptive bet on humanity’s fate is moving into the realm of science fiction: Humanoid robots, UFOs and quantum computing.】

item.title: 由锐步联合创始人支持的初创公司将在太空设计鞋子
item.description: 一家鞋业初创公司正与两家太空公司合作，在轨道上设计一款鞋，作为使人工智能和区块链比在地球上更便宜、更环保的任务的一部分。【原文：A footwear startup is teaming up with two space companies to design a shoe in orbit as part of a mission to make artificial intelligence and blockchain less expensive and more eco-friendly than it is on Earth.】

item.title: 特朗普称接替美联储鲍威尔的名单上有三四人
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，他心目中有三四个人可以在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔明年任期届满时接替他。【原文：President Donald Trump said he has three or four people in mind to succeed Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell when his term expires next year.】

item.title: 霍尔木兹海峡安全隐患缓解，中东石油流量激增
item.description: 伊朗和以色列在美国斡旋下实现停火后，人们对这一重要水道安全的担忧有所缓解，因此霍尔木兹海峡的油轮运输量有所回升。【原文：Oil tanker traffic through the Strait of Hormuz rebounded as concerns about security in the vital waterway eased following the US-brokered ceasefire between Iran and Israel.】

item.title: 实得工资再次下降，南非人倍感压力
item.description: 根据 BankservAfrica 的数据，5 月份南非人的实际收入比上月下降了 1.1%。【原文：South Africans real take-home pay declined by 1.1% in May from the previous month, according to BankservAfrica.】

item.title: 芬兰领导人敦促俄罗斯在边境附近集结时保持冷静
item.description: 芬兰总统亚历山大-斯图布（Alexander Stubb）表示，在有报道称俄罗斯在北约成员国边境附近集结军队之际，芬兰保持 "冷静和镇定"。【原文：Finland’s President Alexander Stubb said his nation remains “calm and collected” amid reports of Russian troop buildup near the NATO member’s border.】

item.title: 苹果准备对应用商店进行修改以躲避更多欧盟罚款
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监督机构在对苹果公司处以 5 亿欧元（约合 5.8 亿美元）罚款后发出了最后通牒，苹果公司准备对 App Store 进行进一步修改，以安抚欧盟反垄断监督机构。【原文：Apple Inc. is poised to offer further App Store changes to appease European Union antitrust watchdogs who issued an ultimatum after doling out a €500 million ($580 million) fine.】

item.title: 刚果与新加坡三叉戟公司签署数字身份识别协议
item.description: 刚果民主共和国与新加坡 Trident Digital Tech Holdings Ltd. 签署了一项协议，开发国家数字身份和电子政务系统。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo signed an agreement with Trident Digital Tech Holdings Ltd. of Singapore to develop a national digital identity and e-government system.】

item.title: 特朗普政府敦促上诉法院支持关税权
item.description: 特朗普政府为总统征收大规模全球关税的权力辩护，向联邦上诉法院辩称，法院应推翻认定征税违宪的裁决。【原文：The Trump administration defended the president’s power to impose sweeping global tariffs, arguing to a federal appeals court that it should overturn a decision finding the levies unconstitutional.】

item.title: 英国电动汽车增长可能导致深夜用电量飙升
item.description: 家用汽车充电器通常在能源充足且便宜的情况下通宵供电。但随着越来越多的驾驶者使用电动汽车，这种情况将发生改变，从而打破传统的供需平衡。【原文：Home car chargers typically power up overnight when energy is plentiful and cheap. But that’s set to change as more and more drivers go electric, upending the traditional supply-demand balance.】

item.title: 中东停战后风险偏好推动非洲债券上涨
item.description: 由于投资者押注以色列和伊朗之间的停战协议将得以维持，油价下跌降低了通胀预期并提高了非洲大陆的实际利率，非洲债券正随着投资者重返高收益资产而反弹。【原文：African bonds are rallying as investors return to high-yield assets amid bets that the truce between Israel and Iran will hold, with lower oil prices cutting inflation expectations and boosting real rates on the continent.】

item.title: 荷兰极右翼领导人在北约峰会上讨好特朗普总统
item.description: 荷兰极右翼领导人 Geert Wilders 在海牙北约峰会期间会见了唐纳德-特朗普，两人讨论了 "制定更严厉的移民法的必要性"。【原文：Dutch far-right leader Geert Wilders met with Donald Trump on the sidelines of the NATO Summit in The Hague, where they discussed “the need for tougher immigration laws,” Wilders said in a post on X.】

item.title: 美国新房销售创 2022 年以来最大降幅，原因是可负担性差
item.description: 美国 5 月份新房购买量创下近三年来的最大降幅，原因是大量的销售激励措施未能缓解经济承受能力的限制。【原文：US purchases of new homes fell in May by the most in almost three years as rampant sales incentives fell short of alleviating affordability constraints.】

item.title: 据说德意志交易所将为数据部门 10 亿美元的首次公开募股增加银行参与
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德意志交易所（Deutsche Boerse AG）在权衡是将一家私募股权公司持有的股份上市还是回购时，为其治理数据和分析部门 ISS Stoxx 可能进行的 10 亿美元首次公开募股增加了更多的银行。【原文：Deutsche Boerse AG has added more banks to a potential $1 billion initial public offering of its governance data and analytics unit ISS Stoxx, according to people familiar with the matter, as it weighs whether to list a stake held by a private equity firm or buy it back.】

item.title: 巴西央行调整外汇策略以减少掉期交易堆积
item.description: 在过去的几个月里，巴西央行在货币市场上越来越活跃，使用不同的工具进行干预，分析人士认为，这是为了最终提高雷亚尔的吸引力，减少套利交易。【原文：Brazil’s central bank has become more and more active in the currency market over the last few months, using different tools to intervene in what analysts say is a push to ultimately make the real more attractive and cut down on arbitrage trades.】
